snippet.title: Going Under Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Going Under is coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Playstation 4 and PC in Quarter 3 2020! Take on the unpaid internship from hell in this quirky roguelite! Clear failed tech-startups that have turned into dungeons! Battle their employees who have turned into mosters! Your only weapons, any junk you find lying around. Are you ready to gain 'valuable work experience'?

Wishlist Going Under on Steam and play the FREE demo here: http://bit.ly/GoingUnderSteam

#GoingUnder #GoingUnderConsole #IndieGames

Learn more: http://bit.ly/GoingUnderGame

Official website: https://aggrocrab.com/going-under
Follow Aggro Crab Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AggroCrabGames
Join Aggro Crab's Discord: https://discord.gg/Aggrocrab
Follow Aggro Crab Games on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aggrocrab/
Like Going Under on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoingUnderGame/
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd 
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/ 

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
